Behold <S%G2400><s%>, this is the third time <S%G5154><s%> I am <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G2655><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be a burden <S%G2655><s%> to you <S%G5216><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I seek <S%G2212><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> yours <S%G5216><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to lay up <S%G2343><s%> for the parents <S%G1118><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the parents <S%G1118><s%> for the children <S%G5043><s%>.

If <S%G2532><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> more abundantly <S%G4056><s%>, am I loved <S%G25><s%> the less <S%G2276><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> be it <S%G1473><s%> so <S%G2077><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> did <S%G2599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> myself burden <S%G2599><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>; but <S%G5225><s%>, being crafty <S%G3835><s%>, I caught <S%G2983><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with guile <S%G1388><s%>.

lest <S%G3361><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> when I come2064, 3825 my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> should humble <S%G5013><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> before <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I should mourn <S%G3996><s%> for many <S%G4183><s%> of them that have <S%G3340><s%> sinned heretofore <S%G4258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> repented <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lasciviousness <S%G766><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they committed <S%G4238><s%>.
